full_text: Drie 2 Sve ata the Baer IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 2020/KER/942 PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE ASHOK MENON THURSDAY, THE 09TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 19TH POUSHA, 1941 Cr1.MC.No.142 OF 2020(G) AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN CP 56/2018 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS ,KATTAKADA CRIME NO.1168/2017 OF Malayinkeezh Police Station , Thiruvananthapuram PETITIONER/S: 1 SYAMALA AGED 49 YEARS W/O.JAGATHAMMA, MAHARAJAS GARDEN, KADAPPATHALA NAGAR, PEROORKARA, THIRUVANANTHAPURAM. 2 SALINI, AGED 25 YEARS D/O.SYAMALA, MAHARAJAS GARDEN, KADAPPATHALA NAGAR, PEROORKARA, THIRUVANANTHAPURAM. BY ADV. SRI.M.R.SARIN RESPONDENT/S: 1 STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM, PIN-682031. 2 THE SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE, MALAYINKIL POLICK STATION, TRIVANDRUM, REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, PIN-695301. OTHER PRESENT: SRI.B.JAYASURYA SR PP THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 09.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Bp ts ial Crl.MC.No.142 OF 2020(G) 2 2020/KERI942 ORDER Dated this the 9th day of January 2020 Petitioners are accused in C.P.No.56/2018 on the files of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court, Kattakada for having allegedly committed offences punishable under Sections 511 of 306 r/w Section 34 of IPC. 2. Petitioners could not appear on time as a result of which non bailable warrant was issued against them. Petitioners are willing to surrender but apprehends that they may be incarcerated. Petitioners are willing to co-operate with the trial. Hence petitioners are directed to surrender before the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court, Kattakada within a period of two weeks and apply for bail. The bail petition shall be considered and orders passed preferably on the very same date. With these observations, the Crl.M.C is disposed of.
